item.title: Recordings
item.description: When You Let Down Your Hair by Amelia Day Arranged for 10 voices and melodica by Max Randal Recorded in December 2022 The Christmas Song by Jacob Collier Arranged for organ and voice by Max Randal Performed in December 2021 I Love You, Lord Arranged for 8 voices and tubular bells Recorded in October 2021 Paraphrase and Fugue on Greensleeves Composed by Max Randal for trombone sextet

item.title: Scores
Services
item.description: Transcription Services Max is currently accepting offers for transcription and arrangement projects. If you have a recording that you would like him to transcribe, contact him using this form. Please include a link to the audio file, and indicate whether you would like a piano reduction (preferred), full transcription, or arrangement for other instrumentation. Max will gladly work with you to customize the product to fit your ensemble and your own specific vision.

Max Randal (b. 1999) is currently working as a Musical Engineer for Edify Technologies (developers of MusiQuest) and serving as the Minister of Music at Hillwood Presbyterian Church in Nashville, Tennessee. He holds a Bachelor of Music in Piano Performance from Vanderbilt University, where he studied solo performance with Karen Ann Krieger, collaborative techniques with Dean Melissa Rose, organ and baroque realization with Dr. Polly Brecht, and advanced musicianship with Marianne Ploger.
